subject: JUnit for EJBs
msgSnippet: Hello, I ve tried to use JUnit for testing EJBs on Weblogic server, but this doesn t seem to work: I always get a java.lang.ClassCastException:
messageBody:
Hello,
 
I've tried to use JUnit for testing EJBs on Weblogic server, but this doesn't seem to work: I always get a java.lang.ClassCastException: ...BeanHomeImpl_WLStub, when trying to call the bean's home interface. This isn't the case when I test the EJB using another Java client. Can anyone explain why this problem occurs?
 
Thanks,
 
Lieve
